Entries.Event.cs.1258: I finished writing my book, and it ended up being a romance novel! ...You told me once that you enjoyed the genre, and, well, I've also been able to draw some inspiration from real life experiences lately. $l#$b#Here it is, '%book'. It's about a train stewardess who falls in love with a travelling architect... but he's secretly engaged to the ticket collector's daughter!#$b#I *almost* feel like I should split the profits with you, considering how much help you gave me!$h
Entries.Event.cs.1308: You've done well, my boy.^You've done well, my dear.#$b#%farm Farm has never looked better. It's an honour to the family name.#$b#{{GrandparentName}} is pleased.#$b#I must return to the other world, now... but feel free to call on me again when you're ready.
Entries.Event.cs.1309: I'm so proud of you, my boy!^I'm so proud of you, my dear!#$b#You've really turned the place around since we last spoke!#$b#You're a better farmer than I ever was, and you've brought great honer to the family name.#$b#I can feel it now... My spirit is finally put to rest. Bless you.
Entries.Event.cs.1317: You've done well, my boy.^You've done well, my dear.#$b#%farm Farm has never looked better. It's an honour to the family name.#$b#{{GrandparentName}} is pleased.
Entries.Event.cs.1318: I'm so proud of you, my boy!^I'm so proud of you, my dear!#$b#You're a better farmer than I ever was, and you've brought great honour to the family name.#$b#I can feel it now... My spirit is finally put to rest. Bless you.
Entries.Event.cs.1652: Step right up! Pick a colour and place your bet for a chance to double your wager!
Entries.Event.cs.1723: Congratulations! You won 1st place with a rating of {0}!#$b#Your prize is 1,000 star tokens! Spend them wisely.$h#$b#Oh, and don't forget to clean out your grange display box.
Entries.Event.cs.1810: Ahh... I see you in the saloon, surrounded by friends. It doesn't seem like you have any favourites... you're popular with everyone!
Entries.Event.cs.1847: The crystal ball has moved on... I see you somewhere dark... but there you are, inspecting a marvellous gemstone! It's glittering in the light of a small lantern.
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honour on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honour on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.blueboat: I specialise in outdoor decorations. Does anything catch your eye?
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11504: Beautiful country you have here. One of my favourite stops. The pig likes it, too.
Entries.TitleMenu.cs.11724: The travelling merchant visits Stardew Valley twice a week. She sells a wide variety of goods, often at exorbitant prices!
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honour the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, {{GrandparentName}}^^P.S. If Lewis is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12055: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honour the family name, my dear. Good luck.^^Love, {{GrandparentName}}^^P.S. If Lewis is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.Object.cs.12993: You found an artefact! The curator of the local museum might want to know about this.
Entries.Object.cs.12996: You found a peculiar statue behind {{GrandparentName}}'s Shrine.
Entries.TV.cs.13199: The spirits are in good humour today. I think you'll have a little extra luck.
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13235: overfishing of their competitor species allowed them complete access to their favourite food.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13346: enjoy while listening to my favourite radio program
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13462: Hi! I need {0} for a new appetiser I'm thinking about. Drop one off at the saloon and I'll be very grateful.     -Gus
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13473: Hello, it's Emily. I'd like to buy {0} from someone, to craft into some fine jewellery. Thanks!
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13744: Those slimes can be pretty dangerous in groups.#$b#It should be a little easier to go caving now, thanks to your efforts. Enjoy your reward!
Entries.Wand.cs.14319: The golden handle quivers with raw potential. Hold this sceptre to the sky and return home at will.
Entries.TrashCan_Description: When binning an item, you reclaim {0}% of the value.
Entries.ItemRecovery_Engaged_Stack: Alright, I'll see if I can find your lost {0} tonight. I'll drop them off in your postbox tomorrow morning.
Entries.Krobus_AfterWedding: Good morning, @... I sneaked in during the night.$l#$b#It'll take me a while to get used to this new life... This is very different from the sewers...
Entries.MovieTheaterBoxOffice: Get your cinema tickets right here! Give one to a friend to invite them to the film!
Entries.DesertTrader1: Welcome, traveller... interested in making a trade?
Entries.VolcanoShop4: This mountain was the home of my ancestors. Now we live in the ruins of their great civilisation.
